settings.timeline_text: Order now to get it by

settings.heading: Hassle-free returns (30-day guarantee)
settings.content:
We have a 30-day no-questions-asked refund policy.

Just email us your Order ID, and we will return your money.

settings.heading: Shipping & order tracking
settings.content: The average delivery time is 5-8 business days. You will receive the tracking number as soon as the order leaves our fulfillment facility. If the shipment is lost, we will send you a replacement free of charge.

settings.heading: Manage or cancel subscription
settings.content: You're in total control - change or cancel your subscription with a click of a button.

settings.heading: + Strengthens the immune system
settings.text: The effects of Reishi mushroom on white blood cells, which aid in the fight against infection and cancer, can increase immunological function.

settings.heading: + Improves cardiovascular health
settings.text: Reishi has been shown to support cardiovascular health under physical and mental stress.

settings.heading: + Anti-fatigue
settings.text: Reishi mushrooms are known for supporting a healthy stress response and consequently providing energy and stamina to the body and mind.

settings.heading: + Liver health and detoxification
settings.text: The compounds found in reishi mushrooms can support liver health and promote detoxification. The liver plays a vital role in filtering toxins from the body, and reishi mushrooms have been shown to support liver function and protect against liver damage.

settings.title: Happy customer
settings.text: After just a month of trying this brand's supplements, I'm a believer. I’ve noticed a remarkable change in my overall well-being. It's the boost I didn't know I needed!
settings.author: Jordan T.

settings.title: Life. Changing.
settings.text: Two words: Life. Changing. These supplements have become my go-to for maintaining my health. They're a staple in my daily routine now!
settings.author: Alex P.

settings.title: All good
settings.text: I was skeptical at first, but the results speak for themselves. I feel revitalized and more balanced. This brand really delivered on its promises.
settings.author: Tiphani Walker

settings.title: Finally!
settings.text: Finally, a supplement that fits seamlessly into my lifestyle. It’s simple, effective, and I've never felt better.
settings.author: Sam K.

settings.title: Top-notch
settings.text: I’ve tried so many brands, but this one? Top-notch. It's the subtle yet significant lift I needed in my daily health regimen.
settings.author: Taylor G.

settings.heading: What's the shipping cost?
settings.row_content: On average all order shipping costs are 4.5$ to any state in the US. International shipping costs may vary.

settings.heading: When will I receive my products?
settings.row_content:
All products are shipped out from our fulfilment center within 4-6 business days and on average it takes 1-5 business days to deliver your order. If things go smoothly, you place your order on Monday you should receive it by Friday the same week.

Every now and then, such as holiday seasons, there may be a delay on orders due to the high volume coming in within such a short time period. We value being transparent with our customers, so please be patient as we are a small team doing the best we can! Thanks for your understanding.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: In case you receive a product that has been damaged during shipment we will automatically ship out new product for you or issue a full refund. Refer to refund policy on footer of page. If you cancel a non subscription before the order is confirmed to ship you will be issued a full refund. Subscription items can be referred to in subscription policy in footer.

settings.heading: Where are the products manufactured?
settings.row_content: All products are developed and manufactured together with FDA certified and approved supplement manufacturers in the US that comply with the highest GMP standards.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once you will make a purchase and your order will be confirmed, we will send out an order tracking link.

settings.text: We have a no-questions-asked returns policy. Just drop us a line within 30 days and consider it done.
